title: Nowhere to be Found - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Abusive Characters   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   R*pe   Unrequited Love
author: Lan Lin   藍淋
description:
“We are all like mermaids living below the sea. Around me, all that I know, is the sight of complete darkness.”

Lin Jing’s credo in brief–as long as it’s open, there is no PLAY that can’t begin.

Yet surprisingly, that strict good student who encouraged him to attend class everyday, Zhou WenYang, stirred some genuine feelings within him.

It wasn’t easy for both those boys to finally workout their “cohabitation”, but mistakes, accidents and the like were an unfortunate constant:

First, came the witch, then soon after her a wolf stormed in, following these intrusions–somewhere quietly waiting–was the toad!

Once more apologetic and thoughtlessly fickle, Lin Jing looked towards the indifferent Wen Yang, heartbroken.

… was it all truly hopeless?>
